title.rendered: How to Deal with a Revenue Officer

content.rendered: Optima in-house Revenue Officer expert and Enrolled Agent Rosie Steele returns to The Tax Show to continue the RO discussion with CEO David King. You may have been assigned one, or you might be expecting to hear from one if you owe a large sum to the IRS. What is the role of an RO, and how much do they affect your tax case? Rosie and David will tell you everything you need to know about dealing with a Revenue Officer.
